1378340.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Creepy Terrifying Horror Music
1378340.description:
15 Bone-chilling original horror tracks for all kinds of dark, gloomy or terrifying situations. Inspired by great horror games and media such as Corpse Party, Silent Hill, The Walking Dead and more. Track styles range from simple dark piano tracks, to dark ambient electronic, to orchestral.

Features:

* 15 royalty-free tracks
* .ogg, .mp3, .m4a and .wav formats included
* For use in RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

10 Days Remaining
3000 A.D.
Church of the Undead
Exploring The Depths
Fear
Feed The Darkness
Gwen
Interlude
Mansion Of The Lost
Post-Mortem
Reliquum
Rosegale Estate
Terrors of the Night
Theme Of The Broken
Theme Of The Dead
1378340.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
